title: Seven states push to require ID for watching porn online
description: Opponents say laws preventing underage porn access are vague, pose privacy risks.

title: Android launches yet another way to spy on users with “Privacy Sandbox” beta
description: Rather than match iOS's tracking limits, Google built an additional tracking system.

title: Tesla Autopilot workers try to unionize, are “tired of being treated like robots”
description: Buffalo-based workers say invasive monitoring leads some to skip bathroom breaks.

title: Prototype of the final unreleased 3dfx GPU sells on eBay for $15,000
description: You thought an RTX 4090 was expensive? Think again.

title: Mycroft’s privacy-first, crowdfunded smart speaker will ship, but not to backers
description: Echo alternative's privacy focus is worth emulating, despite Mycroft's failure.

title: American Cancer Society to vape company: Keep our name outta your mouth
description: ACS sent a cease-and-desist letter, and Elfbar has deleted its press release.

title: Antarctic researchers say a marine heatwave could threaten ice shelves
description: The rise of ocean heat in Antarctica could potentially disrupt the global climate system.

title: Biden FCC nominee slams critics, says ISPs shouldn’t get to choose regulators
description: "It is critical for at least one member of the FCC to be a consumer advocate."

title: Microsoft will forcibly remove Internet Explorer from most Windows 10 PCs today
description: Internet Explorer dies another of its countless small deaths.

title: How to see without eyes or a protein that senses light
description: Centipedes avoid light by registering the temperature changes it induces.

title: The US Air Force successfully tested this AI-controlled jet fighter
description: The X-62A Variable Stability In-Flight Simulator Test Aircraft is a modified F-16.
